title: The game doesn't load after i was done with champ select!!!!!
body: I just finished my leaverbuster que, So i wanted to play 1 fast ranked game. After i was done with champ select the game show the screen with all of the players and there spells and stuff. then the game stopped working. so i turned it off and on again. by the time i was back my team remaked and i got my freakin leaverbuster again

replies.body: It kind of sounds like you got hung up on that champion loading screen. Sometimes if your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with the game servers it can cause some weird issues on the loading screen. Double check your #[**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything we might need to adjust, but get back with me if that's not helping.
